doc.title: World Poker Exchange London Open
doc.plot: Big-time poker arrives in London and regular guys get to compete with the world's finest. This special London-based poker event sees the finalists of FHM's World Poker Exchange Tournament compete in a nail-biting round of high-stakes card play with a massive £2 million up for grabs, making it the competition's biggest pot ever. Following a special series of online and live events hosted by FHM, the best ten players have each won a seat - worth a whopping £10k - at this intense three-day, 200-strong tournament! The competition will see these amateurs flexing their canny card skills alongside celebrity aficionados and seasoned poker pros. The show follows the fortunes of FHM's top ten, while expert commentators and pundits guide viewers at home through all the bluffs, raises and folds
